ygData.subject: Cybertronian Order of Monks
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I m sick of waiting for this post.  2 Pascifist bios are up and that s enough proof that the council approves for me. BIC:  Gracius stares out of a window

OOC: I'm sick of waiting for this post.  2 Pascifist bios are up and 
that's enough proof that the council approves for me.

BIC:  Gracius stares out of a window as they come out of Transwarp 
space.  He reconizes the place as Earth.  He controls his surprise 
and appears as if he were expecting this.

Gracius:  It appears the Matrix has plans for us that may involve 
reordering history.  Perhaps we can end the Great War by teaching the 
Autobots and Decepticons of peace.  Cheetah prepare the Peacecraft 
(I'm a Gundam fan and I made up the name at the last minute) for 
transformation.

The ship begins descent towards a Northern land area resembling the 
Himalaya Mountains.
